collectible.title: Sakura's Bra
collectible.subtitle: Surprisingly cushy!
collectible.text:
Suitable that an idol-singer would have a big set of hooters.
There seems to be a telephone number on the inside...
collectible.unlock: Be the winner in a game against Sakura.

collectible.title: The Ugliest Freaking T-Shirt
collectible.subtitle: But it's signed!
collectible.text: Franchouchou #1 had some merch for you! She even signed it after the game! There's also a phone number... curious, maybe you should send a text?
collectible.unlock: Beat Sakura and three other musicians, or at least one other member of Franchouchou. Player does not need to win.
